text: Helmstedt – Wolfsburg is a constituency in Lower Saxony represented in the Bundestag, the German parliament. The constituency elects one representative under the mixed member proportional representation (MMP) system. Under the current constituency numbering system, it is designated as constituency 51. ==References== Category:Federal electoral districts in Lower Saxony Category:1949 establishments in West Germany Category:Constituencies established in 1949
title: Helmstedt – Wolfsburg
